Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate cursed beings in the depths of the Hungry Caverns.

Your targets are {@LinkCreature:8#4011#aberrant gulons}, {@LinkCreature:8#4021#reanimated popori}, {@LinkCreature:8#4032#caiman bonethralls}, {@LinkCreature:8#4031#skeletal caimans}, {@LinkCreature:8#4041#cruel inquisitors}, {@LinkCreature:8#4051#vulgar inquisitors}, {@LinkCreature:8#4052#vicious auric imps}, and {@LinkCreature:8#4061#undying miners}.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
